participant_1.background:
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
since my dog died i am incomplete.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.
I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends.
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

participant_2.background:
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i am a lesbian.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
i still love to line dry my clothes.

content.text: Hi, I'm a juggler, but I'm from a small town in the Midwest!
Nice to meet you! I'm also from a small town in the Midwest, I grew up fishing and learning about animals!
All kinds! I love learning about their behavior and how they live.
That's so cool! I'm more of a dog person, but I do love learning about animals too.
Me too! What's your favorite kind of dog?
I love all dogs, but I have a soft spot for golden retrievers. They're so sweet and friendly.
They are! I've always wanted a golden retriever, but I've just never had the time for one.
I know what you mean, they're a lot of work! But they're so worth it.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I love meeting new people from the Midwest.
Me too! It's always nice to connect with someone who understands where you're coming from.
Totally! I think we'd be good friends.
